name: Inside | Out
description:
The Game

Jump into the bizarre tale of Inside | Out, a recursive first-person adventure set under a mysterious dome. 

The world around you is contained within itself, an infinite loop where actions in one variant of the world affects the other copies.

Progress and transform the environment around you, bring items into the smaller world to scale them up and use their larger form to advance in the adventure.

Will you manage to escape this perpetual world?

Controls

WASD / Arrow keys - Movement
Space - Jump
Mouse - Look around
Escape - Pause

Development

This experience was developed for my final year project at university. A special thank to Eliza Socican and Eliot Chyskos for their help in 3D modelling and game design.
